section.title: Standalone Lifecycle Manager
section.para: All the examples use a deployer-in-the-cloud scenario where the first controller is also the deployer/lifecycle manager. If you want to use a standalone lifecycle manager, you will need to add the relevant details in control_plane.yml, servers.yml and related configuration files.
